name: Untitled 1.5.1 She Radioes The Universe
description: A sequel to IUPUI GGJ 2018's Untitled 1.5: A Day In The Life Of A Lowly Paid Intergalactic Phone Operator, we find our unnamed operator alone in a radio tower field located in deep space. The disruptive properties of a nearby nebula are causing serious issues to incoming transmissions, and our heroine must work hard to repair these transmissions and get them to where they need to go.
